abstract: Like some people, I have misgivings about Twitter. Not a philosophical quarrel. It's more that I'm just not very good at tweeting.
snippet: Like some people, I have misgivings about Twitter. Not a philosophical quarrel. It's more that I'm just not very good at tweeting.
lead_paragraph: Like some people, I have misgivings about Twitter. Not a philosophical quarrel. It's more that I'm just not very good at tweeting. Mostly, I do it to promote the magazine's articles, but sometimes that feels too self-serving, and I impulsively tweet something that momentarily strikes me as witty and/or meaningful. That never goes well. A few weeks ago, I tweeted inanely about umbrellas. Why should anyone care? It haunts me still.
